line.text: 'You have an ongoing favor of this type with this race. Time left: '

line.comment: * SWM3 free favors when joining Mandalorians

line.text: 'You don't have enough favor points with this race.'
'You already know all the sectors they could show you.'
'Cannot sign a truce with a faction in total war.'
'Cannot sign a truce with an ally.'
'A truce has already been signed with this faction.'
'This sector has already been selected for another race.'

sval.val: You have an ongoing favor of this type with this race. Time left:
You don't have enough favor points with this race.
You already know all the sectors they could show you.
Cannot sign a truce with a faction in total war.
Cannot sign a truce with an ally.
A truce has already been signed with this faction.
This sector has already been selected for another race.
